GapFillInput.Title: Activity verbs
GapFillInput.Instruction: Type a verb in the correct form into each gap. Start the verb with the letter in brackets ( ).

Content.Question:
1. We often go (g) to the cinema.
2. Sally plays (p) the guitar very well.
3. Do you often visit (v) your parents?
4. On Sundays we usually do (d) nothing.
5. My grandfather always writes (w) a letter to me every week.
6. You never listen (l) to me!
7. Do you like playing (p) computer games?
8. Where do you go (g) swimming?
9. My son watches (w) television a lot.
10. I like reading (r) magazines.
